TEXT.S: Donnie Boyce sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1973, ryax sa tay 2 nqu tay 9, Donnie Boyce, squliq na p'unro. qnxan nya(qyanux nya) Donnie Boyce mqwas biru maki ilinuoico meut' puluouesuotung gocyu.cyux hopa pqwasan biru praw squliq na p'unro. qnxan na sinsiy 2011 kawas, Boyce t'aring pcbaq seto' maki pqwasan biru(Proviso East). 2015 kawas 10 byacing 19 ryax,Boyce NBA na Texas Legends sinsiy. 2016 kawas 3 byacing, Boyce mtzyaw sinsiy nya maki Proviso East.
